wms_article.title: Nongshim opens Shin Ramyun experience store in Vietnam

wms_article_body.body: Nongshim Co. said on Monday that it opened an instant noodle experience store, Shin Ramyun Bunsik, in Ho Chi Minh City last Thursday. The outlet is the company’s third global store, alongside its locations in Machu Picchu, Peru, and Tokyo, Japan. It is also the first offline showcase of Nongshim’s new global brand slogan, “Spicy Happiness In Noodles” (SHIN), which was introduced in July 2025. The Vietnamese store features a cultural space where visitors can sample Nongshim’s instant noodles and experience elements of Korean culture popular in Vietnam, such as K-pop and e-sports.
